keywords: ['shofar music', 'short notes', 'long notes', 'short burst of notes', 'no other instruments', 'no voices', 'religious music', 'sound of battle call']
caption: This song features a shofar being played. This shofar plays one long note. This is followed by 8 short bursts of three-note groupings. This is followed by one short note and one higher pitched note played for a longer duration. This pattern is played three times. There are no other instruments in this song. There are no voices in this song. This instrument has religious significance. This song can be played prior to a battle call.
